item.title: Blog Post - Python within R?
item.description: For my first blogpost, I will write about how you can actually write python code in R! The python and R code can communicate between each other by using the proper tag on the code chuncks and libraries. Here is some example base R with the "Loblolly" datset below: plot(Loblolly$age,Loblolly$height) Now in Python, I will run a code that finds the deflection of a bicycle pedal made of ABS Plastic and PVC.
